txt.en: You have encountered Sharshûg, the menacing Troll. Sharshûg's handlers are tasked with keeping his rage at bay until the siege begins.
Sharshûg can be found patrolling Pelennor Fields.\n\nYou have encountered Sharshûg and should defeat the beast for the good of the people of Gondor.
You have defeated Sharshûg and the beast's warband.
Sharshûg can be found roaming Pelennor Fields. Sharshûg's handlers are tasked with keeping his rage at bay until the siege begins.
Sharshûg can be found patrolling Pelennor Fields.\n\nYou have encountered Sharshûg and should defeat the beast for the good of the people of Gondor.
You have slain Sharshûg and vanquished a threat to the safety of all that dwell within Minas Tirith.
You have defeated Sharshûg and the beast's warband!
